query:
SELECT * FROM (
                SELECT
                    index,
                    transaction_index,
                    address,
                    amount
                FROM accounts
                WHERE index > $1 AND index < $2
                ORDER BY
                    (CASE WHEN $4 THEN index END) DESC,
                    (CASE WHEN NOT $4 THEN index END) ASC
                LIMIT $3
            ) ORDER BY index ASC
